data.name: ❂ Hexaluga ❂ Dungeons and Hunting ☠
data.detailed_description:
Other games in the universe of ❂ Hexaluga ❂:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/845200/_Hexaluga__Weapon_and_Shield/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/809450/_Hexaluga__Witch_Hunters_Travelling_Castle/


About the Game

The events of the game carry us to one of the islands of the universe of ❂ Hexaluga ❂ https://store.steampowered.com/app/728050/_Heroes_of_Hexaluga/ which has recently been invaded by lots of monsters.

None of the hunters is able to fight them all and bring peace to the lands. They need a leader that can gather a party of heroic fighters to hunt these creatures in dungeons. Are you ready to become that hero, win honor in battles, and earn gold?

Main features:
* Discover a combination of RPG and clicker in one game;
* Gather a party of randomly generated fighters;
* Fight monsters in dungeons;
* Use fighters' skills in battles;
* Let your fighters use their skills automatically and just watch the battle,
* Or help them fight by choosing the right skill.

data.short_description: Gather a party of heroic fighters and lead them through various dungeons to hunt dangerous monsters in this atmospheric RPG-clicker game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
